Histogram.SetYLabels: 1='No Errors'|2='Any Error'|3='DMB or CFEB CRC error: 01'|4='DMB or CFEB L1A Match error: 02'|5='Fiber Connection changed: 03'|6='Sync Lost was detected by DDU: 04'|7='Two Single Bit-Vote Errors: 05'|8='TMB or ALCT CRC error: 06'|9='Timeout Error: 07'|10='Lost CSC End of Data occurred: 08'|11='Lost Control word in event: 09'|12='CSC Error detected: 10'|13='DDU Clock-DLL error: 11'|14='64-bit alignment error: 12'|15='DAQ FIFO Near Full: 13'|16='DDU Single Event Warning: 14'|17='DDU Single Event Error: 15'|18='DDU Critical Error: 16'|19='TMB/ALCT-DDU L1A Mismatch: 17'|20='TMB/ALCT Word Count Error: 18'|21='ALCT Error: 19'|22='TMB Error: 20'|23='S-Link Not Ready: 21'|24='S-Link Full Bit Present: 22'|25='DDU Input Detected error: 23'|26='One Single Bit-Vote Error: 24'|27='No Live Fibers: 25'|28='Data Stuck in FIFO: 26'|29='L1A-FIFO Full: 27'|30='Wrong First Word: 28'|31='CFEB Count Error occurred: 29'|32='No Good DMB CRC: 30'|33='DDU-CFEB L1 Number Mismatch occurred: 31'|34='CSC LCT/DAV Mismatch occurred: 32'|
